Author: Crabby Paddy#6239
Content: Gotcha. So wallet.dat and keys will all remain? Just git clone and compile

Author: Crabby Paddy#6239
Content: fatal: destination path 'komodo' already exists and is not an empty directory.

Author: Crabby Paddy#6239
Content: Do I have to delete whole komodo folder beforehand?

Author: Crabby Paddy#6239
Content:
git clone https://github.com/komodoplatform/komodo --branch master --single-branch
cd komodo
./zcutil/fetch-params.sh
# -j8 = using 8 threads for the compilation - replace 8 with number of threads you want to use
./zcutil/build.sh -j8
#This can take some time.

Author: Crabby Paddy#6239
Content: cd komodo, git pull, then build work?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: it is better to remove the komodo directory and follow the exact instructions from above

Content:

some times build may fail when doing this, and may need to be repeated

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
also, be careful when doing `rm -rf komodo`
if you add a dot before komodo, it could delete your wallet.dat and blockchain data as well
